TopicTitle: Struts don't reset on wing edit

Articles.Content:
Version: 0.1.0.0.20892

Computer Specs
OS: Windows 11 22H2
CPU: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
GPU: Nvidia GTX 1660 6GB
RAM: 16GB

Attaching a strut to a wing and then resizing the wing doesn't update the strut's end position and leaves it attached to nothing. It still detects it as being attached to the wing when launching the craft but the position doesn't change
